PageSettings.Description: OLTS Loss (w ave if Bi-Dir) and ORL (T500 data) with Inspection Results
PageSettings.HelpText:
Loss or Power Table w Ave and ORL
Fiber Number, Wavelength, Loss Results by direction with
Ave Loss and ORL for the fibers as tested using T500.
Report template can also be used for generating Ave loss for bi-directional OPM Loss Measurements
